Articles.Content:
With the station contracts can you just add on to a station that's already in flight? or do I need to build one completely from scratch? Example I have a station in space that I placed additional docking ports to for future growth it has something like enough to house 6 kerbals. My new contract says make a station that can have 9 kerbals. 

[the question] If I fly additional modules up and dock to the old station will the contract be complete?

Are you using a station contracts mod, or just stock contracts....

Read the contract carefully, If it says build a new station, I suspect you will need to build a new station.

If it just says build a station, then you can probably just expand your current station to house more Kerbals.
